author: wrowe
msg: Flip the order.  If the user specifies ScriptInterpreterSource,
either Registry or RegistryStrict, test the registry in preference
over a shebang line.  This is how 1.3 behaved, and allows scripts
with invalid shebang lines (straight from another box, for example)

author: brianp
msg: Added in the worker MPM's version of the POD code

author: brianp
msg: switch back to the worker's version of the pod code

author: brianp
msg: Added support for MPMs that live in subdirectories under server/mpm
